thread.title: Head of U.N. Nuclear Agency Responds to Criticism Over Iran Probe
thread.title_full: Head of U.N. Nuclear Agency Responds to Criticism Over Iran Probe - WSJ

author: Laurence Norman
title: Head of U.N. Nuclear Agency Responds to Criticism Over Iran Probe
text:
The head of the United Nations agency charged with leading a probe into Iranâ€™s past nuclear activities defended the investigation on Thursday, hitting back at suggestions it had ceded control of inspections to Iran.
The largely secret side deal between Iran and the International Atomic Energy on how to carry out the probe was reached the same day as a final nuclear accord between Iran and six world powers, and has become the main... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
